cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)

exm.mng: to come one after the other
lit. rubbing shoulders and following in each other's footsteps, a thronging crowd
to turn on one's heel, in the twinkle of an eye, instantly
to rub one's head and heels (idiom); to slave for the benefit of others, to wear oneself out for the general good
to stand on tiptoe and crane one's neck (idiom); fig. to yearn for sth
